author: Wayne Collins
method: Place all of the cocktail ingredients into a cocktail shaker with a handful of ice and stir until well combined. Strain the cocktail into a highball glass filled with crushed ice and garnish with the pineapple leaves and a slice of guava.
ingredients: 1 tbsp fresh lime juice,  1 tsp vanilla syrup,  25ml/1fl oz aloe vera juice,  25ml/1fl oz guava juice ,  2 dashes angostura bitters,  25ml/1fl oz white rum,  25ml/1fl oz sourz pineapple liqueur ,  1 tbsp dark rum,  2 pineapple leaves ,  slice fresh guava
